activities: Strativity Group, Inc. (“Strativity”) receives personal information regarding natural persons located in the EU, the EEA and Switzerland as a result of (1) the use and operation of strativity.com and cemcertification.com, and (2) Strativity’s provision of services for its clients as a customer experience management company.  In performing such services, Strativity obtains information regarding its clients’ individual customers located in the EU, EEA and Switzerland.  Such information may be provided to Strativity by its clients or affiliates or directly from its clients’ individual customers.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
